message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this incredible product that's worth a lot to me.  I'm willing to offer it to you for $10000.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the product's value to you, but I am only able to offer $9500 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still looking for something a little closer to my asking price. How about $9750?  I'm confident this product will be a great value for you.
Alice, I've given this some thought and would like to offer $9600 for the product. I hope this is within your range.
